name: Christmass Boxing
description:
Place some stuff to create some gifts!  The better the gift, the more stuff you unlock

Building types:

DoughMaker - makes dough

Plank - just a plank

Flamethrower - cooks stuff (yes)

PlantBox - Grows Plants (and grass :/ )

spring - 1 time item launcher

Mixer - mixes stuff to create better stuff

Snowglobe - makes snowballs

conveyor - pretty self-explanatory

Coder - makes code

Good luck and have fun!

Game was made in 10 days  for Secret santa game jam.
